pageContext.claim: “My administration is defending your sacred right to choose the doctor and the plan that you want, and we are offering plans up to 60% cheaper than Obamacare.”
pageContext.analysis: We were not able to verify Trump's claim of a 60 percent reduction in premiums. But the new short-term health plans authorized by the administration are less expensive for a reason: they offer skimpier coverage and thus provide less protection.
